response.job_title: Process Engineer | Energy transition | Upstream | Midstream | Refining | Petrochemical
response.summary: Process Engineer who is competent in the energy sector with 5 years of experience in Oil&Gas, Upstream, Midstream, Refining, and Petrochemical. Specialized in developing Feasibility, Basic Design, FEED, and EPC phases of Debottlenecking, Grassroots, and Revamps projects. Worked in multicultural teams of 30 members.
response.skills: Oil & Gas, Process Engineering, Communication, Team Leadership, Renewable Energy, Microsoft Office, Process Simulation, Energy Efficiency, Process Optimization, Chemical Engineering, Piping and Instrumentation Drawing (P&ID), Aspen HYSYS, Public Speaking, Problem Solving, Creativity Skills, Easily Adaptable, Process Design, HTRI Software, PFD, Pro II

profile_positions.description:
- Led a team of 3 engineers who were responsible for delivering process engineering documents for Ecopetrol Upstream facilities.
- Revised engineering documents (PFD/P&ID, simulations, H&MB, datasheets, etc) and specifications for equipment, valves, PSVs, and instrumentation according to standards and practices (API, ASME, NFPA).
- Mentoring junior process engineers through development programs.
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer II

profile_positions.description:
- Built hydraulic simulations from the ground up in SPS with both refined products and crude oil for the Colombia Midstream sector.
- Conducted overpressure protection studies for refining and petrochemical industries, resulting in enhanced safety and reduced shutdown time by 5%.
- Delivered 100% of engineering documents such as PFD/P&ID, simulations, H&MB, datasheets, etc without impacting time or project cost.
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer I

profile_positions.description:
- Performed Heat Exchanger Network Design to reduce CW consumption by 5% for the Early Works Project Assiut Hydrocracker Complex (Egypt).
- Optimized Utility systems to increase LPS production by 2% for the PDP Lihuayi Lijin 200 KTA ABS Project (China).
- Attended training programs “Refining Industry” and “6th Tipiel Process Engineering Development Program” during the initial 4 months.
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer I

profile_positions.description:
- Negotiated dealings with Enel, Brinsa, and Argos while managing relationships with BinMaster, ALIA, and ENOTEC during the initial 3 months.
- Engineered an EPC for a remote pH-control system to reduce contaminants of the ash water by 5% for the Termozipa thermal power plant (Colombia).
profile_positions.title: Sales Engineer

company.name: SERINGTEC S.A.S.
company.description:
Somos una Empresa que presta servicios de Consultoría, estudios, diseños e Interventoría de proyectos de ingeniería a nivel nacional e internacional; suministro, instalación y mantenimiento de infraestructura industrial, con personal competente en la ejecución de actividades encaminadas a brindar un servicio con altos estándares de Calidad, Responsabilidad Social,  Ambiental, Eficiencia y Cumplimiento.

PORTAFOLIO DE SERVICIOS:

- Piping

- Proceso

- Operaciones

- Civil

- Mecánica 

- Instrumentación y Control

- Telecomunicaciones

- Gestión y Control de Proyectos

- HSE

location.address: Calle 11 # 4 – 39 Centro Comercial LECS, Locales 137 y 138 Barrio Centro
